title: missing combat text
body: hi does anyone know why my combat text is not showing? I tried reinstall the game and I've tick all the boxes but the combat text still missing I don't know why. Does anyone know how to fix this? Thanks a lot.

replies.body:
Sounds like there's probably some missing or dodgy files if all the settings are ticked to have it turned on.

Try running a **client repair** through settings (the gear icon top right) > Initiate Full Repair.

If that doesn't work try **reinstalling the game** with the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends).

If that still doesn't fix your issue **submit a ticket** to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to help you further.

> [{quoted}](name=Seras Dragon,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=qqpR6keB,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-02-25T03:00:34.109+0000)
>
> Sounds like there's probably some missing or dodgy files if all the settings are ticked to have it turned on.
> 
> Try running a **client repair** through settings (the gear icon top right) > Initiate Full Repair.
> 
> If that doesn't work try **reinstalling the game** with the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends).
> 
> If that still doesn't fix your issue **submit a ticket** to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to help you further.

thank you I'll try that
